tool_description: Fast and Reliable Company / Business Searches, Reviews, and more from Trustpilot in Real-Time (unofficial API).
name: Trustpilot Company and Reviews Data
title: Trustpilot Company and Reviews Data

api_list.name: Companies in Category
api_list.description: Get the full list of companies in a specific company, with extensive filtering capabilities and pagination support. Supports the options / filters available on the best companies in category page (e.g. https://www.trustpilot.com/categories/gaming).

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Only return companies / businesses from a specific country, specified as an ISO 639 (alpha-2) country code.

**Allowed values:** For a list of supported region/country codes see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes (Alpha-2 code).
**Default:** the language of the \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"locale\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" parameter value.

optional_parameters.name: claimed
optional_parameters.description:
Only return claimed companies / businesses.

**Default:** false.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
How to sort the companies in the results.

**Allowed values:** `most_relevant`, `reviews_count`, `latest_review`.
**Default:** `most_relevant`.

optional_parameters.name: verified
optional_parameters.description:
Only return verified companies / businesses.

**Default:** false.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The page to return (each page includes up to 20 results).

**Allowed values:** `1-100`.
**Default:** `1`.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: city_or_zip_code
optional_parameters.description: City or zip code from which to return companies / businesses.

optional_parameters.name: min_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only return companies with at least the specified rating.

**Allowed values:** `3`, `4`, `4.5`.

api_list.name: Consumer Reviews
api_list.description: Get all consumer reviews with pagination support.

required_parameters.name: consumer_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the consumer (review author) for which to get reviews.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The page to return (each page includes up to 20 results).

**Allowed values:** `1-100`.
**Default:** `1`.

api_list.name: Company Details
api_list.description: Get the full details of a specific company by company domain.

required_parameters.name: company_domain
required_parameters.description: The domain of the company for which to get details (e.g.gossby.com).

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

api_list.name: Consumer Details
api_list.description: Get the full details of a consumer.

required_parameters.name: consumer_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the consumer for which to get full details.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

api_list.name: Company Reviews
api_list.description: Get all company reviews with extensive filtering and capabilities and pagination support. Supports the filters / options seen on Trustpilot company reviews pages (e.g. https://trustpilot.com/review/gossby.com).

required_parameters.name: company_domain
required_parameters.description: The domain of the company for which to get reviews (e.g.gossby.com).

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only return reviews with certain ratings. Can take a single value or comma separated list of ratings (e.g. *4,5*).

**Allowed values:** comma separated (,) list of the following values: `1`, `2`, `3`, `4`, `5`.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Return reviews matching a specific query / keyword.

optional_parameters.name: date_posted
optional_parameters.description:
Return reviews posted in specific time ranges.

**Allowed values:** `last_12_months`, `last_6_months`, `last_3_months`, `last_30_days`.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The page to return (each page includes up to 20 results).

**Allowed values:** `1-100`.
**Default:** `1`.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
How to sort the reviews in the results.

**Allowed values:** `most_relevant`, `recency`.
**Default:** `most_relevant`.

optional_parameters.name: verified
optional_parameters.description: Only return verified reviews

optional_parameters.name: with_replies
optional_parameters.description: Only return reviews with owner replies

api_list.name: Category Details
api_list.description: Get the full details of a category, including subcategories, parent categories, sibling categories and more information.

required_parameters.name: category_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the category for which to get full details.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

api_list.name: Recently Reviewed Companies in Category
api_list.description: Get the list of recently reviewed companies is a specific category.

required_parameters.name: category_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the category for which to get the recently reviewed companies.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

api_list.name: Newest Companies in Category
api_list.description: Get the list of newest companies is a specific category.

required_parameters.name: category_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the category for which to get the newest companies.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

api_list.name: Category Search

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

api_list.name: Company Search
api_list.description: Search for companies / businesses on Trustpilot. Supports pagination and rating and review count filters.

optional_parameters.name: min_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Only return companies with at least the specified rating.

**Allowed values:** `3`, `4`, `4.5`.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
Locale code to use. Corresponds to the country selector on the [Trustpilot website](https://www.trustpilot.com/) footer. 

**Allowed values:** `da-DK`, `de-AT`, `de-CH`, `de-DE`, `en-AU`, `en-CA`, `en-GB`, `en-IE`, `en-NZ`, `en-US`, `es-ES`, `fi-FI`, `fr-BE`, `nl-BE`, `fr-FR`, `it-IT`, `ja-JP`, `nb-NO`, `nl-NL`, `pl-PL`, `pt-BR`, `pt-PT`, `sv-SE`

**Default:** `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
The page to return (each page includes up to 10 results).

**Allowed values:** `1-100`.
**Default:** `1`.

optional_parameters.name: min_review_count
optional_parameters.description:
Only return companies with at least the specified number of reviews.

**Allowed values:** `25`, `50`, `100`, `250`, `500`.
